What's that over there?\""},{"lineNumber":222621,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうしただすか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What's wrong?\""},{"lineNumber":222622,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、あっちの方に","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, over that way,"},{"lineNumber":222623,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんか変なのが見えるような……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I think I see something strange...\""},{"lineNumber":222624,"originalJapaneseLine":"長田君の指さす先を見れば、","translatedEnglishLine":"Looking where Nagata pointed,"},{"lineNumber":222625,"originalJapaneseLine":"遠くからでもかすかに、","translatedEnglishLine":"even from afar, faintly,"},{"lineNumber":222626,"originalJapaneseLine":"黒く蠢くなにかが見えた。","translatedEnglishLine":"something black writhing could be seen."},{"lineNumber":222627,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちょっと行ってみる？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Shall we go check it out?"},{"lineNumber":222628,"originalJapaneseLine":"　＜エール＞ちゃん、どうする？」","translatedEnglishLine":"<Yell>-chan, what do you think?\""},{"lineNumber":222629,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………。」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":222630,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んふふ、りょーかい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nfufu, got it.\""},{"lineNumber":222631,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うっしゃ！　さっそく行こうぜ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright! Let's go right away!\""},{"lineNumber":222632,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは長田君に手を引かれて、","translatedEnglishLine":"You were pulled by the hand by Nagata,"},{"lineNumber":222633,"originalJapaneseLine":"その謎の物体を目指した。","translatedEnglishLine":"and headed toward the mysterious object."},{"lineNumber":222634,"originalJapaneseLine":"「僕も賛成だな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I agree too."},{"lineNumber":222635,"originalJapaneseLine":"　よく分からない物に不用意に近づくものじゃない」","translatedEnglishLine":"You shouldn't recklessly approach something you don't understand.\""},{"lineNumber":222636,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んじゃ、俺は反対だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well then, I disagree."},{"lineNumber":222637,"originalJapaneseLine":"　行こうぜ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's go.\""},{"lineNumber":222638,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……お前って奴は」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...You really are something.\""},{"lineNumber":222639,"originalJapaneseLine":"「オラ、早く行くぞー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Come on, let's go quickly!\""},{"lineNumber":222640,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こら！　待たないか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey! Wait for us!\""},{"lineNumber":222641,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、行っちゃった……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, they went off...\""},{"lineNumber":222642,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ……仕方ない、私達も行くわよ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sigh... It can't be helped, we have to go too...\""},{"lineNumber":222643,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前らー！　リーダーは＜エール＞だぞー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, you guys! The leader is <Yell>!\""},{"lineNumber":222644,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ちゃんと言うこと聞けよなー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Listen to her properly!\""},{"lineNumber":222645,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなた達はザンスと乱義を追いかけ、","translatedEnglishLine":"You chased after Zansu and Rangi,"},{"lineNumber":222646,"originalJapaneseLine":"謎の物体目指して進むことにした。","translatedEnglishLine":"deciding to proceed toward the mysterious object."},{"lineNumber":222647,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んじゃあ行こうぜ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, let's go!"},{"lineNumber":222648,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あんな面白そうなもん、","translatedEnglishLine":"Something that looks so interesting,"},{"lineNumber":222649,"originalJapaneseLine":"　無視したらバチが当たるって！」","translatedEnglishLine":"we'd deserve punishment if we ignored it!\""},{"lineNumber":222650,"originalJapaneseLine":"「未知との遭遇！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Encounter with the unknown!"},{"lineNumber":222651,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これぞ冒険の醍醐味よ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"This is the thrill of adventure!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しないようにといつも言っているのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I always say not to do that, yet...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 愚痴るように乱義はそう言っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rangi said that as if complaining.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後、皆で楽器を演奏しあう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After that, everyone played instruments together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 音楽会が何故か始まった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For some reason, a music concert started.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長田君はタンバリンの扱いが妙に上手く、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nagata was strangely good at handling the tambourine,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロッキーはどの楽器を扱わせても下手と、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: while Rocky was bad at playing any instrument he tried,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆の知らない一面を見ることが出来た。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: showing a side of themselves that no one had seen before.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、最後にはザンスと乱義が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And in the end, Zansu and Rangi

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 音楽で勝負をすることになるという
いつもの結果に落ち着いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: which settled into the usual outcome.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふ」
隣で二人の喧嘩を眺めている深根は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fukane, watching the two quarrel beside them,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し楽しそうに見えた。
JAPANを飛び出して二週間――
あなたはいくつもの冒険を経て、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You have gone through many adventures,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そろそろゼスに足を踏み入れようとしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and were about to set foot in Zeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなた達はゼスを目指して
自由都市の平原を進んでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: advancing through the plains of the Free City.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ゼスかー、何気に俺、
首都に行くのは初めてなんすよねぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's my first time going to the capital."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、ゼスはハニーに厳しい国だすからね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, Zeth is a harsh country when it comes to Honey."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、今回は同行人が沢山いるし？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, this time we have lots of companions, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺にもゼスの町並みが楽しめそうだぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looks like I can enjoy the cityscape of Zeth too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん？　なんだろ、あれ」
「どうしただすか？」
「いや、あっちの方に
なんか変なのが見えるような……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think I see something strange..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長田君の指さす先を見れば、
遠くからでもかすかに、
黒く蠢くなにかが見えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: something black writhing could be seen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちょっと行ってみる？
＜エール＞ちゃん、どうする？」
「んふふ、りょーかい」
「うっしゃ！　さっそく行こうぜ！」
あなたは長田君に手を引かれて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You were pulled by the hand by Nagata,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その謎の物体を目指した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and headed toward the mysterious object.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「僕も賛成だな。
よく分からない物に不用意に近づくものじゃない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You shouldn't recklessly approach something you don't understand."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んじゃ、俺は反対だ。
行こうぜ」
「……お前って奴は」
「オラ、早く行くぞー」
「こら！　待たないか！」
「あ、行っちゃった……」
「はあ……仕方ない、私達も行くわよ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sigh... It can't be helped, we have to go too..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前らー！　リーダーは＜エール＞だぞー！
ちゃんと言うこと聞けよなー！」
あなた達はザンスと乱義を追いかけ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You chased after Zansu and Rangi,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 謎の物体目指して進むことにした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: deciding to proceed toward the mysterious object.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んじゃあ行こうぜ！
あんな面白そうなもん、
無視したらバチが当たるって！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we'd deserve punishment if we ignored it!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「未知との遭遇！
これぞ冒険の醍醐味よ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is the thrill of adventure!"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

あなたは長田君に手を引かれて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You were pulled by the hand by Nagata,

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and headed toward the mysterious object.

よく分からない物に不用意に近づくものじゃない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You shouldn't recklessly approach something you don't understand."

行こうぜ」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前らー！　リーダーは＜エール＞だぞー！
ちゃんと言うこと聞けよなー！」
あなた達はザンスと乱義を追いかけ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You chased after Zansu and Rangi,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 謎の物体目指して進むことにした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: deciding to proceed toward the mysterious object.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んじゃあ行こうぜ！
あんな面白そうなもん、
無視したらバチが当たるって！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we'd deserve punishment if we ignored it!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「未知との遭遇！
これぞ冒険の醍醐味よ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is the thrill of adventure!"
